Ellos no entienden la emoci√≥n que tenemos al hacer un tk , o aun mejor detonarlos a todos no conocen los nervios de 1 vs 3 con poca hp.

Los nervios cuando queda un teammate en un 1vs1 , con poca hp y sin buy, y la alegr√≠a de cuando en este momento el enojo , Los insultos por una pecheada o una mala lata o tan solo dejar c4 en base. la risa con amigos ,teammates , lo que sea pero no conocen esa sastifaccion que nos da jugar al counter.

Es Un Juego Espectacular! Ya Que Valve Tiene Este Juego Todos Lo QuierenN Es Un Buen Juego Felicito A Steam Por Sacar El Counter'Strike
The original CS that turned me into a life long fan. 10/10 back in the day...

What i like in this game:
Gunplay, good gun sounds and they give suitable physical impact, although animations haven't aged well ;)
Teamwork/cooperation aspect, not very complicated, no real different player classes, but obviously a sniper won't go to assault tasks with the primary weapon at least
Highly customisable, skins, sounds, textures, makes this game fitting for so many different kindsa players with a relatively little effort

Then, things i don't like in this game:
Graphics, that's the only thing really, but the good thing is the simple old graphics make everything clear to see and distinguish

Cel mai tare joc din toate timpurile ,nu ma pot satura de el ,imi place absolut totul la acest joc .... Bravo celor de la Valve !
Tot respectul !!!
